Traces of COVID-19 were detected on July 27 and July 28 at the Marlin Coast sewage catchment in Cairns northern beaches.
Queensland Health said the result indicated there could be a case in the catc… [+564 chars]

articles.title: 'Serves them right': Ugly reality of USA's Olympic heartache exposed - Yahoo Sport Australia
articles.description: The fallout to the American women's soccer team's Olympic heartbreak has been swift and brutal. Read more here.
articles.content:
American players have been slammed for kneeling during the anthem before matches at the Olympics. Pic: Getty
